localised_description: A mistress of the Dark Arts, she commands devastatingly destructive magic.
The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.
Not only a mage but also a Princess, and a relative of the Phoenix King Finubar.
The utmost concentration, the greatest attention to detail, are required if the world is to be saved from the destructive madness of the Ruinous Ones.
An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.
Those that surpass the Sun Dragons in might and enlightenment are known as Moon Dragons.
The Star of Avelorn was taken from the heavens by Isha and bound to a crystal. It holds the power to heal mortal wounds.
Fashioned into the shape of a striking asp, the staff writhes and spits with the spiteful anger of Asaph, Goddess of Vengeance.
Chief Handmaiden is the trusted of all the Handmaidens and is tasked with leading the Handmaidens in the protection of the Everqueen if called upon to do so will die for her.
As Chief Handmaiden it her duty to ensure the very best of warriors which can mean life or death of their beloved Everqueen.
Wildwood are a prison for the most malevolent of forest spirits which the Wildwood Rangers guard.
A gift from Daith for the Lord of Cythral.
Armour Crafted from materials in the wildwoods of Cythral it said to hide users from anyone sight.
Years fighting monsters teach you how the bes way to kill them.
Those in the Wildwoods of Cythral learns the Art of ambushes better then any other part of Athel Loren.
The eyes of those that stalk the paths in Cythrals ready to cut down any that don't belong.
The Asrai move through the forests with great agility to dodge unlike their elven kin.
